```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggprism)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
themes <- names(ggprism_data$themes)[-length(ggprism_data$themes)]

lapply(
  themes, 
  function(x) preview_theme(palette = x)
)
```
